title: Rads Error Fix!!!

replies.body:
Manually deleting your folders like this could cause file corruption, installation problems, or further issues in addition to the rads error you are receiving.  

It's also unlikely that this would resolve the issue because the problem isn't necessary with your game files, but your OS settings preventing them from being accessed properly.  Before anything else, I recommend going over our [Permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to ensure that game files can actually be scanned and written.  Hope that helps!
God forbid I ever have to see that Rads Error but if I do then I will try what you suggested. Thank you for replying.
